title: Enhancing Learning Design Practice Competencies: Interactive Second Language Acquisition Short-Term Program for Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-Level Basic Second Language Knowledge and Understanding of Scientific Terminology
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners must demonstrate contextualized use of 50+ science-related technical vocabulary items by the end of the 1-week course
Learners must enhance logical argumentation and information exchange skills during peer interactions via synchronous text chat
Learners must clearly convey scientific concepts in a second language during oral presentation assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
